name: Timetabling Project
description: A web application for managing and optimizing timetables, built with React, Node.js and MySQL. Developed to streamline scheduling processes and improve efficiency in educational institutions. Collaborative project using Agile methodologies and modern web technologies in line with project sponsors requirements.

name: Dissertation- Responsive Education WebApp
description: A web application for managing and optimizing timetables, built with React, Node.js and MySQL. Developed to streamline scheduling processes and improve efficiency in educational institutions. Collaborative project using Agile methodologies and modern web technologies in line with project sponsors requirements.

name: Mobile Application Development (Kotlin) - POI Manager
description: Kotlin Mobile Application for managing Points of Interest (POI) with features like adding, editing, and deleting POIs. The app uses a local SQLite database for data storage and implements a user-friendly interface for easy navigation.

name: Portfolio Site
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experiences. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, this site is designed to be responsive and user-friendly.

name: Diabetes Dataset- Data Science Workflow
description: A comprehensive data science project analyzing a diabetes dataset to extract insights and build predictive models. The project includes data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, model training, and evaluation using Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, and Matplotlib.

name: Personal Finance App
description: A personal finance application designed to help users manage their finances effectively. The app allows users to track expenses, Adjust Savings goals , and visualize their financial data through interactive charts and graphs.

name: Places To Stay - Accommodation Search/ Booking WebApp
description: Full stack web application for searching and booking accommodation. The App features accommodation listings, search functionality, Map Integration using Leaflet, User authentication and Booking Functionality. Built with React, Node.js, and SQLite.
